title: New league client doesnt work
body:
Hey Riot,

Today i downloaded the new client but when i press start, the client it  just doesnt show up, untill i open league of legends again, then i see a big black box  that doesnt show anything.
 when i close the black box after clicking on close for like 15 times and i try to open league again, it says that it is already running but i just closed the client and i see nothing in running programs.
pls help me i really want to play league again.

Sincerely ArjenvKlaveren

replies.body:
QuintenPwnzYou is spot on with his response.  Per a recent post on the client boards, our current work around is to perform the following steps:

- Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system 
- Open user.cfg with notepad
- Change the line that says leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no 
- Save and launch League of Legends again.

Our client devs are investigating a fix for this, so when you have a chance feel free to share your report in the linked thread.  Thanks for helping out!

Same issue here, I just reverted to the old launcher.
[LeagueFolder]>RADS>System and open user.cfg, edit 
leagueClientOptIn = yes
to
leagueClientOptIn = no
